sentences.english: But in here, still in the rainy days, the French windows.

sentences.english: I will be in place , and so you give me a complete answer.

sentences.english: Huangma soil on the plain is the main cultivated soil on the Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 塬地黄麻土是黄土高原的主要土种。
